thread.title: Carolyn White
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Carolyn White

author: Carolyn White
title: Carolyn White
text: Mr. Larry & his staff ensured we received professional, friendly and excellent customer service! They worked diligently to meet our needs & listened attentively to what we wanted. By doing so they developed a relationship with us to ensure we would return for future purchases.
